title: Diamond Leaf Motif Pendant: Vanamala Collection
materials: Set in a durable Prong Setting.
features: Delicate leaf design, resembling the sacred Vanamala garland. Each leaf meticulously set with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. Contemporary design with a touch of traditional South Indian sensibility. Perfect to be paired with a gold chain or pearl string.
occasions: Festive Occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
description: This pendant is a statement of elegance and modernity. The delicate leaf motif, reminiscent of the Vanamala, combined with sparkling diamonds, makes it a truly unique piece. Expertly crafted in Hyderabad with meticulous attention to detail. Durable and timeless, perfect for passing down through generations.
